title: SaDAnanE sakalam
sahitya:
SaDAnanE sakalam arpayAmi sadA tvatpAda bhaktim yAmi


caraNam   SaDAdhArAdi shaktyAtmakE SaT trimshat tatva kalAtmakE 
SaDanga shruti vicitrAtmakE SaTkONa madhya sthitAtmakE 
IDyamAnAri nAshAtmakE IshvarAdi nuta guruguhAtmakE 
DhuNDhi gaNEshAnandAtmakE Damaru shUlAdi dhara karAtmakE
